Don't use MPC then?  Never had any issues with anything from Immerse using Splash.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7466665/Falling.Skies.S02E07.720p.HDTV.x264-IMMERSE.mkv - I download this version (?identical torrent) and it played fine. No problems with audio or video.
